p: The gas chromatograph was equipped with Column SE-54 (30 m × 0.32 mm × 0.25 μm) and column temperature was 70°C. The temperatures of the H +-FID flame detector and vaporization chamber were 100°C. Helium was used as carrier gas at a flow rate of 50 mL min -1. Hydrogen was used as fuel gas at a flow rate of 60 mL min -1. The flow rate of air was 400 mL min -1 and the split ratio was 10:1.
